description:
The Making of Continuous Colormaps.

Determine a colormap for visualization with the CCC toolbox.

Welcome to the CCC-Tool! Start the tool by using the button "Begin". After the click the tool will display the MyDesings section. At this section you can organize your stored colormap specifications (CMS), add new ones, reach the test function and export/import session files. Click at the arrow at the bottom of this page to show the quick start . For more help, you can always visit the tutorial page via the menu bar. Enjoy our tool! Best wishes, Pascal Nardini.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'colormaps', 'rainbow colormaps', 'semantically-rich colormaps'
